website_summaries.verdict: Easy once-a-day supplement to help your digestive system work better.
pros: Does not need to be put in the refrigerator
Helps clear irritable stomach and acid reflux
Helps keep the digestive track moving the way it is supposed to
cons: This product does not include as many probiotic strains as other supplements on the market

customer_reviews.title: This product cleared my eczema completely!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with eczema on my hand and fingers for over 20 years, My Allergist recommend this brand and I started taking it and with in a month, my eczema started to clear up, After 3 months I no longer have any at all. I asked my allergist about it and she said it was because it supports your immune system. Thank you sooooo much Garden of life!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Needs no refrigeration, contains several strains and plenty CFU
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of the Garden of Life lineup, and this is no exception. I normally take their RAW probiotic, which has twice the CFUs as this, but this doesn’t need refrigeration, thus is more convenient. At 50 million, this bottle contains a lot, and more than many others. However, one must remember that this is a supplement, and eating an ounce or two of sauerkraut probably contains significantly more CFU
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fujita, author of Toe Up to 10K: A Journey of Recovery from Spinal Cord Injury

customer_reviews.title: Major difference
customer_reviews.text: After taking daily for a week- you notice a huge difference in your stomach. Mine feels great and I’ve now bought it three times and continue to take it daily. My stomach feels bulletproof whereas before taking this probiotic I used to have a very irritable stomach!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Pills have absorbed toxic smell from container
customer_reviews.text: I have bought over 300 amazon products over the year but this is the first review I make because people need to know. This is made in a type of plastic that is known to be toxic. When you open the container it reeks of chemicals, and even the pills have absorbed the chemicals, you taste them as you put the pill in your mouth. Get another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sadok Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it has been previously opened
customer_reviews.text: I received a bottle with only 27 capsules, and no cotton insert in the bottle. It looks like it has been previously opened. I am disappointed that the item is not eligible for return, and I don't feel safe taking the product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Federico

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic.
customer_reviews.text: Great probiotic. It is worth the extra money. I have taken the cheaper ones before. My body seems to respond well to these. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dustie L Hollon Jr

customer_reviews.title: Gave all over itchy body rashes looking something like measles
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the prebiotic gave me all over body rashes (looking something like measles). Dr. told could be because of heat hives or some allergy. Tried antihistamine but didnt work. Immediately stopped taking the prebiotic. On extreme itch, on Dr. recommendation, tried Pepcid (Histamine-2 blocker) and that worked with immediate relief after fifth day. Bottom-line is this prebiotic produced some kind of acid inside the body for me which gave skin rashes all over the body. Will not be using pre-biotic.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I take a probiotics supplement daily and I like to switch probiotics brands every couple of months. this keeps my system in pretty good shape I am regular , have much less gas and in general feel good. during the month I was taking this product things got worse and worse. It was just like i was a couple years ago when i was not taking probiotics. About a week ago I stopped taking these and started back on another brand and everything is good again. So in my case I can only conclude these are fake pills.
customer_reviews.author: Vapor

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: First I was confused as to why such a big bottle when 30 caps only fill 1/2 of it. That led me to count the caps which led to me discovering some were leaking powder and 1 cap was almost EMPTY! Im picturing a bunch of scammers in a basement somewhere frantically filling caps with the cheapest stuff they could find and then repackaging using fancy marketing and tripling price. I guess they need to hire more workers , they are filling caps to fast and they are leaking everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite probiotic...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many probiotics and I like this one best. Others have commented on the packaging, but that says nothing about the product. It is good quality and gives me the probiotics I need. I have had good results with it. I have ulcerative colitis and this probiotic works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: GAP

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: My Doctor tried different drugs whose side effects were worse than the gastrointestinal problems I experienced. These Pro Biotics are like a Peace Treaty with my Gut. I found a new best buddy. Who knew I'd find him at Amazon. This ain't a promo. It really helps.
customer_reviews.author: John Pyre

customer_reviews.title: To good health!
customer_reviews.text: Tasteless. I heard that these can help with fibromyalgia and other ailments, but I have found an increase in energy. Not super powers of course, but tasks seem easier and I think these are the reason.
customer_reviews.author: PBT

customer_reviews.title: Mmm probiotics ain’t my bag.
customer_reviews.text: I felt terrible while taking this stuff with my antibiotics. I may be histamine intolerant or it could have been the antibiotics making me feel terrible but the symptoms persisted well after I stopped taking them and subsided once I got off of all the probiotics. My throat felt tight and I had a lot of mucus. Ymmv The research I found said no probiotic is going to actually settle in your gut, the best way to do that I concluded was with exposure to good bacteria in healthy environments (forests and beaches) and oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: I'm highly skeptical of everything and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm highly skeptical of everything and these probiotics actually seem to be working; by working I mean improving the quality and outcome of my digestive activity. --Alex Kalamaroff
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Graden Kalamaroff

customer_reviews.title: It floods your system with good bacteria to drown out the bad

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Helping
customer_reviews.text: I used this for months to better help the pain and discomfort of my IBS. Then suddenly, it started having the opposite effects. My stomach aches for multiple days, even if I just take 1 pill. I dont know what changed, but I will not be ordering again

product_meta.title: Probiotics for Men - Garden of Life Dr. Formulated Once Daily Men's Probiotics 50 Billion CFU Daily Probiotic for Constipation Relief with Organic Prebiotic, 30 Capsules (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Dr. Formulated Probiotics Once Daily Men’s is a unique “just one capsule a day” shelf stable probiotic for men. Once Daily Men's is a specifically designed vegetarian supplement with a high probiotic count to support a healthy microbiome and men’s specific health needs. Dr. Perlmutter created this unique formula with a high count of beneficial probiotics made from diverse strains, including Lactobacilli and Bifidobacteria, that are resistant to stomach acid and bile, exclusively for men's colon support, occasional gas and constipation relief and immune system health. David Perlmutter, M.D., is an expert in the human microbiome, a board-certified neurologist, Fellow of the American College of Nutrition, America’s brain-health expert and #1 New York Times best-selling author.
feature_bullets: DIGESTION SUPPORT: This once daily probiotic supplement contains Lactobaccilus acidophilus and Bifidobacteria for digestive health and constipation relief
PROBIOTICS FOR MEN: Specially formulated probiotic for men's specific health needs and colon support
IMMUNE SUPPORT: This dietary supplement has 50 billion CFU and 15 probiotic strains for immune system health
SHELF STABLE PROBIOTICS: This 50 billion probiotic comes in 30 one daily capsules; no refrigeration required
HYPOALLERGENIC PROBIOTIC: Our probiotics supplement is dairy free, gluten free, soy free, and vegetarian

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
